item.title: 中国电动汽车初创企业尼欧为新版 ET7 轿车确定起售价
item.description: 中国电动汽车（EV）初创企业尼奥公司首席执行官周四表示，该公司已将新版ET7轿车的起售价定为42.8万元人民币（合59063美元）。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle (EV) startup Nio has set the starting price of the new version of its ET7 sedan at 428,000 yuan ($59,063), its chief executive said on Thursday.】

item.title: 比亚迪推出 "仰望 "品牌第三款超豪华车型
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪周四发布了其 "仰望 "品牌下的第三款超豪华车型--U7，在价格战愈演愈烈的情况下，比亚迪正在向高端市场挺进，以提高盈利能力。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker BYD unveiled the U7, its third ultra-luxury model under the Yangwang brand, on Thursday, as it makes a push upmarket to increase profitability amid an intensifying price war.】

item.title: 日产推出四款概念车助力中国市场回归
item.description: 日产汽车周四发布了四款面向中国市场的概念车，这家日本汽车制造商希望扭转近年来在全球最大汽车市场份额不断下降的局面。【原文：Nissan Motor unveiled four concept cars for the Chinese market on Thursday as the Japanese automaker looks to stage a reversal from recent years of losing share in the world's largest auto market.】

item.title: 股市受科技股暴跌影响；日元在干预区摇摆不定
item.description: 周四，亚洲股市下跌，原因是 Facebook 母公司 Meta Platforms 令人失望的盈利预测打击了科技股，而日元汇率自 1990 年以来首次跌破 1 美元兑 155 日元，引发了东京方面进行干预的担忧。【原文：Asian stocks fell on Thursday as disappointing earnings forecasts from Facebook parent Meta Platforms hammered tech shares, while the yen's slump past 155 per dollar for the first time since 1990 raised the spectre of intervention from Tokyo.】

item.title: 临床实验室运营商 Labcorp 将以 2.39 亿美元收购破产的基因测试制造商 Invitae
item.description: 实验室服务提供商 Labcorp 周三表示，它将收购软银支持的 Invitae 公司通过自愿破产保护程序拍卖的资产，这是在这家基因测试制造商申请破产几个月后。【原文：Laboratory service provider Labcorp said on Wednesday it will acquire Softbank-backed Invitae Corp's assets auctioned through a voluntary bankruptcy protection process, a few months after the genetic test maker filed for bankruptcy.】

item.title: 小米 SU7 汽车锁定超过 7.5 万份订单，目标 6 月交付超过 1 万辆
item.description: 中国智能手机制造商小米公司创始人雷军周四表示，截至 4 月 24 日，其运动型 SU7 电动轿车已锁定 75,723 份订单，目标是在 6 月份交付超过 10,000 辆。【原文：Chinese smartphone maker Xiaomi has locked in 75,723 orders for its sporty SU7 electric sedan as of April 24, and aims to deliver over 10,000 units in June, founder Lei Jun said on Thursday.】

item.title: 梅赛德斯表示将继续投资与中国的合作
item.description: 梅赛德斯-奔驰公司中国区负责人周四表示，该公司将继续投资于与中国合作伙伴（如互联网公司百度）的合作，并指出中国对其全球战略至关重要。【原文：Mercedes Benz's China chief said on Thursday the company would continue to invest in tie-ups with Chinese partners like internet firm Baidu , noting China was crucial to its global strategy.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利亚洲私募股权基金首席执行官卸任，将重组地区团队
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份内部备忘录，摩根士丹利亚洲私募股权投资公司（Morgan Stanley Private Equity Asia）正在重组该地区的团队，因为现任亚洲区首席执行官周勤（Chin Chou）即将离职。【原文：Morgan Stanley Private Equity Asia is reorganising its teams in the region as its current chief executive of Asia Chin Chou is leaving the firm, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 对美国需求的担忧超过对中东冲突的担忧，石油价格下跌
item.description: 周四早盘，油价有所回落，原因是人们对美国经济可能因推迟降息前景而放缓的担忧超过了对中东冲突扩大风险的担忧。【原文：Oil prices eased in early trade on Thursday as concerns about a potential slowdown in the U.S. economy amid prospects for delayed interest rate cuts outweighed worries over the risk of expanding conflict in the Middle East.】

item.title: 日元在155关口挣扎，市场对干预保持警惕
item.description: 周四，随着日本央行（BOJ）为期两天的利率制定会议拉开帷幕，日元兑美元走低至155，这让交易商对东京是否会在政策审议仍在进行时进行干预感到紧张。【原文：The yen was pinned on the weaker side of 155 per dollar on Thursday as the Bank of Japan (BOJ) kicks off its two-day rate-setting meeting, leaving traders nervous as to whether Tokyo will intervene while policy deliberations are still underway.】

item.title: 龙舌兰酒制造商贝克尔第一季度利润下降 18
item.description: 世界上最大的龙舌兰酒生产商墨西哥酿酒商贝克公司周三公布，第一季度净利润同比下降 18%，为 10.00 亿比索（约合 6100 万美元）。【原文：Mexican distiller Becle, the world's largest tequila producer, on Wednesday posted a 18% fall in first-quarter net profit from the year before, landing at 1.00 billion pesos ($61 million).】

item.title: 与破产的 Gol 公司谈判结束后，拉美航空放弃了收购波音 B737 飞机的计划
item.description: 拉塔姆航空公司（LATAM Airlines）周三表示，在谈判失败后，该公司不再寻求从破产的巴西航空公司戈尔（Gol）或其他来源购买波音 B737 飞机，而是选择寻找其他窄体飞机。【原文：LATAM Airlines said on Wednesday that it was no longer seeking to acquire Boeing B737 planes either from bankrupt Brazilian carrier Gol or other sources, opting to look for alternative narrowbody aircraft after talks failed.】

item.title: 思科称黑客颠覆其安全设备监视政府
item.description: 技术公司思科系统公司（Cisco Systems）表示，黑客已经颠覆了该公司的一些数字安全设备，入侵了全球政府网络。【原文：Technology firm Cisco Systems said that hackers have subverted some of its digital security devices to break in to government networks globally.】

item.title: 聚焦：中国比亚迪力图为电动车一代重新定义豪华车
item.description: 中国电动车制造商比亚迪将于本周四在北京车展上展示其高端品牌的首款轿车，向德国梅赛德斯-奔驰等公司发起挑战。【原文：Chinese EV maker BYD will showcase its premium brand's first sedan at the Beijing auto show from Thursday, in a challenge to the likes of Germany's Mercedes-Benz which three years ago pulled out of the brand's development citing slow sales.】

item.title: 令人失望的 Meta 预测拖累同行科技股延续跌势
item.description: 事实证明，Facebook 母公司 Meta Platforms 令人失望的预测具有传染性，在盘后交易中引发了科技股和科技相关股票的抛售。【原文：Disappointing forecasts from Facebook parent Meta Platforms has proven contagious, sparking a sell-off in tech and tech-related stocks in after-hours trading.】

item.title: 法院重启全食超市工人对 "黑人生命至上 "面具的诉讼
item.description: 美国上诉法院重启了一起诉讼，指控全食超市非法解雇了一名拒绝摘下 "黑人生命至上 "面罩并抱怨该高档连锁杂货店存在种族主义的工人。【原文：A U.S. appeals court revived a lawsuit accusing Whole Foods of illegally firing a worker who refused to remove her "Black Lives Matter" facemask and complained about racism at the upscale grocery chain.】

item.title: 早间竞价日本外汇市场不景气，美达指数暴跌
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，必和必拓计划对英美资源集团提出潜在收购要约
item.description: 据彭博新闻社援引知情人士的话报道，全球矿业巨头必和必拓集团（BHP Group）正在考虑收购英国跨国矿业公司英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）。【原文：Global mining giant BHP Group is considering a potential buyout of British multinational mining company Anglo American Plc , Bloomberg News reported, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国将在 5 月底前决定波音公司是否违反起诉协议
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，美国司法部官员计划最快于5月底决定波音公司是否违反了一项协议，该协议规定波音公司在2018年和2019年的致命坠机事故中免于刑事起诉。【原文：U.S. Justice Department officials plan to decide as soon as late May whether Boeing violated an agreement that shielded the planemaker from criminal prosecution over fatal crashes in 2018 and 2019, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 墨西哥沃尔玛第一季度净利润增长 14
item.description: 沃尔玛墨西哥和中美洲分部周三公布，其第一季度净利润同比增长 14.4%，达到 131.8 亿比索。【原文：Walmart's Mexico and Central America unit on Wednesday posted a 14.4% year-on-year rise in its first-quarter net profit, reaching 13.18 billion pesos.】

item.title: 西南航空公司空乘人员批准新合同
item.description: 代表西南航空公司和该公司员工的工会周三表示，西南航空公司的空乘人员周三投票赞成立即加薪 22% 的新合同。【原文：Southwest Airlines' flight attendants on Wednesday voted in favor of a new contract with an immediate 22% pay raise, the union representing the employees and the carrier said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国将在 5 月底前决定波音公司是否违反起诉协议
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，美国司法部官员计划最快在 5 月底决定波音公司是否违反了一项协议，该协议规定波音公司在 2018 年和 2019 年的致命坠机事故中免于刑事起诉。【原文：U.S. Justice Department officials are planning to decide as soon as late May whether Boeing violated an agreement that shielded the planemaker from criminal prosecution over fatal crashes in 2018 and 2019, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，联邦存款保险公司正在接触 Republic First 的潜在买家
item.description: 彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道称，美国联邦存款保险公司（FDIC）正在与 Republic First Bancorp 的潜在买家进行谈判。【原文：The Federal Deposit Insurance Corp (FDIC) is in talks with potential buyers for Republic First Bancorp , Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：惠而浦将在全球裁员 1,000 人
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三报道，家电制造商惠而浦公司将在全球范围内裁员1000人。【原文：Home appliance maker Whirlpool Corp is cutting 1,000 salaried jobs globally, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 墨西哥卷饼需求回升，Chipotle 墨西哥烤肉店上调全年销售预期
item.description: 奇波特尔墨西哥烤肉店周三上调了全年销售预期，尽管菜单价格上涨，但其相对富裕的顾客群对卷饼和盖浇饭的需求仍将保持稳定。【原文：Chipotle Mexican Grill raised its full-year sales forecast on Wednesday, betting on resilient demand for its burritos and rice bowls from its relatively wealthier clientele despite higher menu prices.】

item.title: IBM 以 64 亿美元收购 HashiCorp，拓展云软件业务
item.description: 国际商业机器公司（International Business Machines）周三表示，该公司将收购 HashiCorp，交易价值 64 亿美元。【原文：International Business Machines will buy HashiCorp in a deal valued at $6.4 billion, the company said on Wednesday, expanding its cloud-based software products to tap into an AI-powered boom in demand.】

item.title: 福特汽车第一季度调整后利润下降
item.description: 福特汽车公司周三公布第一季度调整后利润下降，原因是该汽车制造商正在应对劳动力和电动汽车生产成本的上升。【原文：Ford Motor Co reported a fall in first-quarter adjusted profit on Wednesday, as the automaker navigates higher costs of labor and electric vehicle production.】

item.title: Meta 提高 2024 年支出预测，支持人工智能发展
item.description: Meta Platforms 周三表示，由于 Facebook 母公司斥巨资推出新的人工智能产品，并加强了支持这些产品的基础设施，预计今年的总体支出将高于此前的预测。【原文：Meta Platforms said on Wednesday it expects overall expenses this year to be higher than it previously forecast as the Facebook parent spends heavily to roll out new AI products and bolsters the infrastructure to support them.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，Blackstone 将以 20 亿美元的交易收购 Tropical Smoothie Cafe
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三援引熟悉此事的人士报道，Blackstone 将以近 20 亿美元的价格（包括债务）收购餐饮连锁店 Tropical Smoothie Cafe。【原文：Blackstone is buying restaurant chain Tropical Smoothie Cafe for nearly $2 billion, including debt, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国银行业监管机构延长对 Capital One-Discover 交易的评论期
item.description: 美国银行监管机构周三宣布，他们将延长 Capital One 收购 Discover Financial 的征求意见期，以便有更多时间听取反馈意见。【原文：U.S. bank regulators announced Wednesday they were extending the comment period on Capital One's bid to acquire Discover Financial to allow more time for feedback.】
